name: Mount Wingsuit
description: Welcome to Mount Wingsuit, where the thrill of hurtling down a mountain side in immersive VR with fast-paced arcade style gameplay will keep you in the zone for hours at a time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer, 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Been playing it using HTC VIVE and it is pure fun!!

I've got this to play on my HTC vive after a friend recommended it to me. I've got to say that I love it. I set up a fan in front of me and the immersion is great. It took a few attempts to get the hang of it but it is quite intuitive with the vive motion controllers and feels very natural now. Well worth the Â£10.99
Ok so it's pretty freaky the feeling of falling.. So far this has been the only experience to give me a bit of motion sickness.. Graphics are kinda eh... But it's certainly unique and different
